name: Mio (Xenoblade) LoRA
description:
Mio (Xenoblade) LoRA

Making models can be expensive. Do you like what I do? Consider supporting me on Patreon 🅿️ or feel free to buy me a coffee ☕

Another character from the Xenoblade series after my Pyra/Mythra/Pneuma LoRA. Trigger is mio \(xenoblade\) and related words (can have any hairstyle and outfit, the model basically points the generic booru keywords to Mio specific stuff), see the examples. Weight around 0.5-0.6. Should work on most anime models, examples are using AbyssOrange2 and AnyLoRA.


How to use LoRA's in auto1111:

  • Update webui (use git pull like here or redownload it)

  • Copy the file to stable-diffusion-webui/models/lora

  • Select your LoRA like in this video

  • Make sure to change the weight (by default it's :1 which is usually too high)
